title: Silver Serpent not working in the store
body: Played {{champion:41}} today, can't use silver serpent at all even when I had like 1000 of them the store didn't let me spend any of those on upgrades for cannon barrage. Is anyone else experiencing this problem? When will riot fix this?

replies.body: yes i have had the same problem
+1, same problem. I had this issue with a custom game of summoners rift. Can we confirm what other game modes this is a proglem on?
